numbered_ace_sentences: 2. States that are closest to the equator experience their first leaf earlier than more northern territories.
3. This tendency is a combination of generally warm weather.
4. This tendency is a combination of the spring season.
5. This tendency is a combination of how cold the weather in each territory remains during early spring.
6. I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how quickly leaves appear on trees.
7. I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how slowly leaves appear on trees.
8. I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how quickly flowers appear on trees.
9. I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how slowly flowers appear on trees.
10. I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how quickly fruits appear on trees.
11. I wonder whether global warming has a significant effect on how slowly fruits appear on trees.
12. A title for this graph could be "May Flowers: An Evolution of Spring".
